title: The Failure of Russian Capitalism With Bill Browder
description: On this podcast we mostly talk about what isn’t working in American capitalism. But, on this episode, we're taking a break to look at how capitalism can go wrong in other countries, specifically...Russia. And we’re going to do that with a very special guest, Putin's so-called number one enemy, Bill Browder.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
